parts.correct_answer:
Complete the text with the correct words.
Gen Z and Gen Alpha are two young generations growing up in a digital world. They often have many things in common, such as using smartphones, tablets, and online apps. Social media helps them connect with friends and family, even if they live very far apart. Both groups like short videos, emojis, and memes, which are trends that usually include people from different backgrounds.
